name: Big Coin
description:
BIG COIN is an exciting 2D platformer game in which players control a character and move it around a level to collect pieces of a coin. The player must collect all the pieces of the coin in each level to advance to the next one. Along the way, the player must also navigate obstacles such as monsters and avoid falling into dangerous pits by jumping at the right time. If the player touches a monster, he will lose a life and have to start the level again.

With its gameplay similar to Super Mario, BIG COIN is an addictive and challenging game that requires precision and quick reflexes. The game features colorful graphics and lively sound effects that create a fun and engaging gaming experience for players of all ages. Get ready to embark on an exciting adventure as you collect coins, dodge monsters, and jump your way through various levels in BIG COIN!
